titles: A briefe description of the portes, creekes, bayes, and hauens, of the Weast India: translated out of the Castlin tongue by I.F. The originall whereof was directed to the mightie Prince Don Charles, King of Castile, &c.
Suma de geographia que trata de todas las particlas & provinces del mundo: en especial de las Indias. English
author: Enciso, Martin Fernández de, d. 1525.
Frampton, John, fl. 1577-1596.
notes: Translation of a part of: Enciso, Martin Fernández de. Suma de geographia que trata de todas las particlas & provinces del mundo: en especial de las Indias.
Running title reads: Of all the portes, creekes, and hauens of the Weast India.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
